scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src && npm install && cd .. && vite build src && npm run reset
scripts.update:lib: cd src && rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && rm -rf dist && cd .. && vue-tsc && vite build src && npm run reset
scripts.reset: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/@squidit/css-vue && npm install
